system:
note description: "Abstraction for objects that can be identified by name." legal: "See notice at end of class." status: "See notice at end of class." keywords: "identifiable" date: "$Date: 2017-05-03 12:17:49 -0700 (Wed, 03 May 2017) $" revision: "$Revision: 100318 $"
deferred class interface ../interface/ev_identifiable_short.xmlEV_IDENTIFIABLE
feature -- Access
f_parent../interface/ev_identifiable_short.xml#f_parentparent: detachable ../interface/ev_identifiable_short.xmlEV_IDENTIFIABLE -- Parent of object require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any_short.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed ensure correct: ../interface/ev_identifiable_short.xml#f_has_parenthas_parent implies Result /= Void correct: not ../interface/ev_identifiable_short.xml#f_has_parenthas_parent implies Result = Void
f_identifier_name../interface/ev_identifiable_short.xml#f_identifier_nameidentifier_name: FalseSTRING_32 -- Name of object -- If no specific name is set, ../interface/ev_identifiable_short.xml#f_default_identifier_namedefault_identifier_name is used. ensure result_not_void: Result /= Void result_not_empty: not Result.Falseis_empty no_period_in_result: not Result.Falsehas ('.'.Falseto_character_32) default_name_available: not ../interface/ev_identifiable_short.xml#f_has_identifier_name_sethas_identifier_name_set implies Result.Falseis_equal (../interface/ev_identifiable_short.xml#f_default_identifier_namedefault_identifier_name)
f_default_identifier_name../interface/ev_identifiable_short.xml#f_default_identifier_namedefault_identifier_name: FalseSTRING_32 -- Default name if no other name is set. ensure result_not_void: Result /= Void result_not_empty: not Result.Falseis_empty no_period_in_result: not Result.Falsehas ('.'.Falseto_character_32)
f_full_identifier_path../interface/ev_identifiable_short.xml#f_full_identifier_pathfull_identifier_path: FalseSTRING_32 -- Full name of object by prepending path of parent -- Uses '.' as a separator. ensure result_not_void: Result /= Void result_correct: ../interface/ev_identifiable_short.xml#f_parentparent = Void implies Result.Falseis_equal (../interface/ev_identifiable_short.xml#f_identifier_nameidentifier_name) result_correct: attached ../interface/ev_identifiable_short.xml#f_parentparent as l_parent implies Result.Falseis_equal (l_parent.../interface/ev_identifiable_short.xml#f_full_identifier_pathfull_identifier_path + "." + ../interface/ev_identifiable_short.xml#f_identifier_nameidentifier_name)
feature -- Status report
f_has_parent../interface/ev_identifiable_short.xml#f_has_parenthas_parent: FalseBOOLEAN -- Does identifiable has a parent?
f_has_identifier_name_set../interface/ev_identifiable_short.xml#f_has_identifier_name_sethas_identifier_name_set: FalseBOOLEAN -- Is a specific identifier name set?
feature -- Element change
f_set_identifier_name../interface/ev_identifiable_short.xml#f_set_identifier_nameset_identifier_name (a_name: FalseREADABLE_STRING_GENERAL) -- Set ../interface/ev_identifiable_short.xml#f_identifier_nameidentifier_name to a_name. require a_name_not_void: a_name /= Void a_name_not_empty: not a_name.Falseis_empty no_period_in_name: not a_name.Falsehas ('.'.Falseto_character_32) ensure identifier_name_set: ../interface/ev_identifiable_short.xml#f_identifier_nameidentifier_name.Falsesame_string_general (a_name)
